00008 #ifndef KGE_MSVC_DEF_H
00009 #define KGE_MSVC_DEF_H
00010 
00011 //=====================================
00012 // os and compiler specific includes
00013 //=====================================
00014 #include <windows.h>
00015 #include <tchar.h>
00016 #include "Config.h"
00017 
00018 //=====================================
00019 // compiler warnings
00020 //=====================================
00021 
00022 // Unwanted VC++ level 4 warnings to disable.
00023 #pragma warning(disable : 4049)
00024 #pragma warning(disable : 4311)
00025 #pragma warning(disable : 4312)
00026 #pragma warning(disable : 4244) // conversion to float, possible loss of data
00027 #pragma warning(disable : 4699) // creating precompiled header
00028 #pragma warning(disable : 4200) // Zero-length array item at end of structure, a VC-specific extension
00029 #pragma warning(disable : 4100) // unreferenced formal parameter
00030 #pragma warning(disable : 4514) // unreferenced inline function has been removed
00031 #pragma warning(disable : 4201) // nonstandard extension used : nameless struct/union
00032 #pragma warning(disable : 4710) // inline function not expanded
00033 #pragma warning(disable : 4714) // __forceinline function not expanded
00034 #pragma warning(disable : 4702) // unreachable code in inline expanded function
00035 #pragma warning(disable : 4711) // function selected for autmatic inlining
00036 #pragma warning(disable : 4127) // Conditional expression is constant
00037 #pragma warning(disable : 4512) // assignment operator could not be generated
00038 #pragma warning(disable : 4245) // conversion from 'enum ' to 'unsigned long', signed/unsigned mismatch
00039 #pragma warning(disable : 4389) // signed/unsigned mismatch
00040 #pragma warning(disable : 4251) // needs to have dll-interface to be used by clients of class
00041 #pragma warning(disable : 4275) // non dll-interface class used as base for dll-interface class
00042 #pragma warning(disable : 4511) // copy constructor could not be generated
00043 #pragma warning(disable : 4284) // return type is not a UDT or reference to a UDT
00044 #pragma warning(disable : 4355) // this used in base initializer list
00045 #pragma warning(disable : 4291) // typedef-name '' used as synonym for class-name ''
00046 #pragma warning(disable : 4324) // structure was padded due to __declspec(align())
00047 #pragma warning(disable : 4996) // 'function': was declared deprecated
00048 #pragma warning(disable : 4800) // 'function': was declared deprecated
00049 
00050 // It'd be nice to turn these on, they can't be used in DEBUG due to the varargs stuff.
00051 #if defined(DEBUG) || defined(_DEBUG)
00052 #else
00053         #pragma warning(disable : 4189) // local variable is initialized but not referenced
00054         #pragma warning(disable : 4505) // unreferenced local function has been removed
00055 #endif
00056 
00057 
00058 //=====================================
00059 // C++11 (C++0x) Support check
00060 //=====================================
00061 #if _MSC_VER >= 1600 
00062         #define KGE_CPP11_COMPILER 1
00063 #else
00064         #define KGE_CPP11_COMPILER 0
00065 #endif
00066 
00067 //=====================================
00068 // DLL export / import
00069 //=====================================
00070 #ifdef KGE_EXPORT
00071         #define KGE_API __declspec( dllexport )
00072 #else
00073         #define KGE_API __declspec( dllimport )
00074 #endif
00075 
00076 #define KGE_IMPORT __declspec( dllimport )
00077 
00078 //=====================================
00079 // wrong compiler settings
00080 //=====================================
00081 
00082 // If C++ exception handling is disabled, force guarding to be off.
00083 #ifndef _CPPUNWIND
00084         #error "Bad VC++ option: C++ exception handling must be enabled"
00085 #endif
00086 
00087 // Make sure characters are unsigned.
00088 #ifdef _CHAR_UNSIGNED
00089         #error "Bad VC++ option: Characters must be signed"
00090 #endif
00091 
00092 
00093 //=====================================
00094 // Other Macros
00095 //=====================================
00096 
00097 #define KGE_FORCE_INLINE __forceinline
00098 #define KGE_NO_INLINE __declspec(noinline)
00099 #define KGE_NAKED_FUNC void _declspec(naked)
00100 
00101 #if KGE_USE_SIMD == 1
00102         #define KGE_ALIGN __declspec(align(16))
00103 #else
00104         #define KGE_ALIGN
00105 #endif

00112 namespace kge
00113 {
00114 // 64-bit architecture
00115 #if defined(__x86_x64__) || defined(_M_X64) || defined(__powerpc64__) || defined(__alpha__) || defined(__ia64__) || defined(__s390__) || defined(__s390x__)
00116         #error "kge dosen't support 64-bit compilition"
00117 #else // 32-bit cpu architecture
00118 
00119         typedef unsigned char   u8;
00120 
00122         typedef unsigned short  u16;
00123 
00125         typedef signed short    s16;
00126 
00128         typedef int                             s32;
00129 
00131         typedef unsigned int    u32;
00132 
00134         typedef unsigned long   ul32;
00135 
00137         typedef float                   f32;
00138 
00140         typedef double                  f64;
00141 #endif
